biotools.summary: A portal to search variants (polymorphism) in UniProt Knowledgebase (UniProtKB) entries, and gives direct access to manual annotation on the genotype-phenotype relationship of each specific variant based on literature, as well as pre-computed information (such as conservation scores and a list of structural features when available) to help assess the effect of the variant.

bioschemas.name: SwissVar
bioschemas.summary: A portal to search variants (polymorphism) in UniProt Knowledgebase (UniProtKB) entries, and gives direct access to manual annotation on the genotype-phenotype relationship of each specific variant based on literature, as well as pre-computed information (such as conservation scores and a list of structural features when available) to help assess the effect of the variant.
